doc:
Leslie Ackerman https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Leslie_Ackerman 0 Leslie Ackerman (born August 2, 1956) is an American actress from New Jersey. She is well known to Star Trek fans for her role as the waitress in the Star Trek: Deep Space Nine 1996 episode "Trials and Tribble-ations". Early in her career, Ackerman starred in the short-lived series 1980 series Skag. She has guest starred in many television shows, such as Barnaby Jones, The Streets of San Francisco, All in the Family, Welcome Back, Kotter, The Incredible Hulk, Quincy, CHiPs, Cagney Lacey, Simon Simon, Moonlighting and Baywatch. In 2000, she wrote, produced and starred in the movie What's Eating You?. Leslie_Ackerman ( born August_2_,_1956 ) is an_American_actress from New_Jersey . She is_well_known to Star_Trek_fans for her_role as the_waitress in the_Star_Trek : Deep_Space_Nine_1996_episode " Trials_and_Tribble-ations " . Early in her_career , Ackerman starred in the_short-lived_series_1980_series_Skag . She has guest starred in many_television_shows , such_as Barnaby_Jones , The_Streets of San_Francisco , All in the_Family , Welcome Back , Kotter , The_Incredible_Hulk , Quincy , CHiPs_,_Cagney_ , Simon_,_Moonlighting_and_Baywatch . In 2000 , she wrote , produced and starred in the_movie What 's Eating You ? .
